mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT CR INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = CR.POST_WRITER

SELECT CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST_ID , CR.POST_WRITER , CR.POST_TITLE , CR.POST_CONTENT , CR.POST_DATE , CR.RECRUIT_START_DATE , CR.RECRUIT_END_DATE , CR.RECRUIT_PROGRESS_YN , CR.RECRUIT_TYPE , CR.MIN_CAREER_YEAR , CR.MAX_CAREER_YEAR , CR.VIEW_CNT , CR.LIKE_CNT , CR.DELETE_YN , M.NICKNAME FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT CR INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = CR.POST_WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC
